mapper.insert: insert into business_activity (tx_id,state,account_trans_state,gmt_create,gmt_modified,propagation) values(#{txId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{accountTransState, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{gmtModified, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{propagation, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update business_activity set
state=#{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_trans_state=#{accountTransState, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create=#{gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified=#{gmtModified, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
propagation=#{propagation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where tx_id=#{txId}
